detail_desc: Short-sleeved top woven in a cotton blend with an embroidered pattern, slightly wider neckline and slits in the sides.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend.
Cap in a cotton weave with an embroidered appliqué at the front. Unlined.
Short, fitted T-shirt in soft fabric with a round neckline.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Low-cut swimsuit with a cut-out section at the front, lightly padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust, and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.
Long nightshirt in a patterned weave with small notch lapels, buttons down the front, a chest pocket, long sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Jumper in fine-knit premium cotton with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in soft, striped cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front with press-studs, and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Sunglasses with plastic frames, metal side pieces and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fitted T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a heart-shaped button at the neckline.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved wrap dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck with a flounce that continues down the front. Seam with ties under the bust, a gently flared skirt and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Gloves in soft imitation suede with decorative stitching on the uppers. Pile lining.
Clamdiggers in an airy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and shaping seams at the knees.
Cold shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with a frill trim and long sleeves.
Aviator-style sunglasses with thin frames and sidepieces in metal and plastic. Adjustable nose pads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Sandals with open sides and toes and crossover straps at the front. Imitation leather insoles.

Set with an A-line top and pair of leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves with narrow trims. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Short jumper in a soft, rib knit with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves.
Top in soft cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Elasticated waistband with a drawstring, and diagonal side pockets.

Blouse in a soft viscose weave. V-neck with a small frill trim, covered buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum with a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Short dress in a soft rib knit with a foldover polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Glittery cap with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back. Lined.
Bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short 5-pocket shorts in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with lace trims around the neckline and armholes.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
T-shirt in patterned cotton piqué with a small embroidered detail at the top. Rounded collar, button placket, puff sleeves and slits at the hem.
Short, pleated skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist. Lined.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a frill-trimmed elasticated waist with a decorative bow at the front, and elasticated hems.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette. For the matching jacket, search on 0241602.
5-pocket trousers in washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.

Single-breasted jacket in soft, brushed, stretch fabric with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. One-button fastening at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Long, wrapover skirt in a viscose weave with ties at one side and a concealed fastening at the other. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Leggings in heavy jersey with flatlock seams. High waist with covered elastication.
Crushed velvet shorts with a zip and tab with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the side. Side pockets, a fake back pocket and a seam at the hems with a flounced trim.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a sequined appliqué, flap with a hook and loop fastening, and a narrow shoulder strap. Satin lining. Size 4.5x11x13 cm.
Wide blouse in woven fabric with dropped shoulders and short, flared, flounced sleeves.

Short, double-breasted trenchcoat in woven fabric with a wide collar, storm flap with a button, fixed shoulder tabs and a loose yoke at the back. Side pockets, a detachable belt at the waist, an adjustable tab and buckle at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined. The polyester content of the coat is recycled.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in an airy patterned weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.

Lined triangle bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable straps that can be fastened in different ways, an elastic hem and a metal fastener at the back.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and long puff sleeves. Decorative scalloped trim around the neckline and cuffs.
Slightly wider jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length suit trousers in an airy linen weave with a zip fly and hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets and gently tapered legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Set with a dress, gilet and tights. Dress in a patterned weave with buttons down the back, a gathered seam at the waist and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Faux fur gilet with a concealed button at the top. Lined. Fine-knit tights in a cotton blend.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with laser-cut edges and cutaway coverage at the back.
Captain's cap in woven fabric with metal buttons at the sides and a braided band at the front. Lined.
Leggings in patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and 3/4-length legs.
Leggings in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and flared legs.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Long-sleeved tops in a soft cotton blend.
Cotton twill shorts with an adjustable elasticated waist, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and a zip fly with a button.
Treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake pockets at the front and real pockets at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Metal rings that spell the word HOPE. Three of the rings are adjustable in size.
Knee-length, off-the-shoulder lace dress with a seam at the waist, concealed zip at the back and gently flared skirt. Lined
Shirt in a cotton weave with a small stand-up collar. Gathered yoke front and back, concealed buttons down the front and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and ties.
Ankle-length trousers in superstretch jersey with a slight sheen. Low, elasticated waist with a decorative button, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Wrapover funnel collar with a decorative drawstring, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and a yoke and darts at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Pyjama bottoms in cotton sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and tapered legs with elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short dress in airy plumeti organza with a deep V-neck and wrapover front. Seam at the waist with ties at the sides and short, raglan puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Lined.
Pyjamas with a top and leggings in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Short-sleeved top. Leggings with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short, sleeveless dress in patterned jersey. Straight cut at the top with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
